entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Becoming sunny late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 24 March 2023
